actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to designate the Kent State National Historic Site.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to study the site known as Blanket Hill at Kent State University, Ohio, for possible designation as the Kent State National Historic Site. Empowers the Secretary to promulgate and enforce reasonable restrictions on the use of such site pending completion of the study.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Kent State National Historic Site.
